description:
Unlock the concentrated power of the much-loved LoamFoam cleaner, easier on the environment and your wallet.

  • One litre yields five litres of cleaner with 80% less plastic waste
  • Carefully balanced formula removes grime without damaging your bike's finish
  • Formulated with organic gelling agents which allow the active cleaning compounds to cling to your bike longer
  • Safe on all bike surfaces, including disc brake rotors and pads
  • Suitable for all bikes
name: Peaty's Loam Foam Concentrated Bike Cleaner 1L
